title: Harvard Islamica Podcast
description: Harvard Islamica, the podcast of the Prince Alwaleed Bin Talal Islamic Studies Program at Harvard University, explores topics related to the scholarly study of Islam and Muslim societies at Harvard and beyond.

title: Sariyah Podcast | بودكاست سارية
description:
بودكاست سارية هو طاولة بحث تسلط الضوء على القضايا التي تشغل بال الشباب اليوم.

السارية هي محرك السفينة فهي تنقل قوة الريح الى جسم السفينة فتحركها، وعليها ترفع الراية ومنها يستشرف الأفق. والريح هي قوى الأمة المبعثرة، وأمّا السفينة فهي جسم الأمة الإسلامية، وعليه فالسارية هي المشروع الذي يصل الأمة بقوتها.

title: Dr. Nasser Karimian
description:
The Dr. Nasser Karimian Podcast features audio recordings of Dr. Nasser Karimian's speeches on a wide range of Islamic subjects.

Dr. Nasser Karimian holds a Bachelor's degree from Concordia University, where he majored in Religion and minored in Classical Arabic Language. He then earned a Master's degree in History and Philosophy of Religion from the same university. Additionally, he is a graduate of the Bayyinah Dream Program and the Qalam Seminary. Dr. Nasser completed his Ph.D. at the International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM).

https://linktr.ee/dr.nasserk

title: Dialog Suwung
description:
Renungan puisi-puisi sakral untuk para perindu Tuhan.

Selamat datang para sahabat Suluk Suwung. Selamat datang di podcast Dialog Suwung ini bersama Pardamean Harahap dan Denny Turner.

Podcast ini lahir dari rekaman sesi-sesi mingguan instagram live di akun IG @suluksuwung. 

Kami berdua adalah sahabat spiritual yang bertemu awal tahun 2000an, dan bersahabat hingga sekarang. Berawal dari berguru kepada mursyid tariqah masing-masing, kami terus menjelajahi kedalaman kasih Ilahi dalam hidup keseharian.

Dalam konteks tasawuf, suwung mengandung makna kekosongan, makna kesadaran berketuhanan. Sering juga dimaknai dengan kata ma’rifat.
 
Kami melakukan dialog, renungan spontan di setiap sesinya. Tema pokok di setiap sesi adalah puisi sakral, ataupun sistematika inspiratif, yang kami gali dari berbagai tradisi.

Melalui dialog spontan ini, kami berkomunikasi dari hati ke hati dengan anda semua. Energi kita semua, adalah doa agar kita dihantarkan oleh Tuhan, menuju Tuhan.

Dialog ini dihadiahkan kepada sesama pejalan yang senantiasa rindu akan Tuhan.

title: Muslim Birthwork with Doula Alqabalia
description:
A series of unique interviews and recounts providing inspirational insight into pregnancy, birth and beyond within the Muslim community. 

Hosted by Amy, the face behind Doula Alqabalia; a Muslimah Birthworker currently based in the East Midlands, UK. 

The series sets out to shed light upon the misconstrued conceptions, assumptions and discrimination that Muslim women and their families face in everyday life. 

The trials and struggles that Muslim people face during the antenatal, birth and postnatal period are highlighted, whether they opt in for access to the maternity services, or not, as the case may be! 

In a time when physiological birth and traditional practices and values around birth are being dissolved, we have a duty to stand up and reclaim our birth rights for both our women and children. 

Providing first-hand information and experiences as an actively involved Birth and Postpartum Doula and Holistic Birthkeeper, Amy brings a raw, real and radical Muslim perspective to the scene.

title: The Hereafter
description: In this series, the Imam vividly portrays the different phases the human soul passes through during its lifetime up to its death as well as the process of judgment of souls and the resulting eternal life in Heaven or Hell in the Hereafter. In breathtaking style the listener hears of the events that occur just before death and the events that come after it. The Imam gives a clear description about life in the grave, the horrors of the last day, the major and minor signs leading to the last hour and the day of resurrection. The Imam crowns this eloquently narrated lecture with the process of accountability and recompense. On the Day of Judgment those who pass the test will be rewarded with Paradise and those who fail will be rewarded with Hellfire.

title: AYC Lectures
description: The Afghan Youth Committee (AYC), established in 2003, is a volunteer-led group of Afghan youth whose mission is to provide programming that infuses the Shia, Afghan and Canadian parts of the youth identity to create community and belonging. title: Tafsir Of Juz Amma By Shaykh Mohammad Akram Nadwi
description:
Welcome to CIC's podcast! 

We will be sharing lectures from a wide range of subjects within the Islamic sciences, each of them filled with pearls of wisdom from Sheikh Dr. Mohammad Akram Nadwi. 

We are launching our channel with Sheikh's tafsir of some of the most recited surah's from the Qur'an. The Tafsir of Juz Amma.

Imagine how it would feel to have a deep understanding of the surahs contained in the last part of the Qur'an - the surahs that are often recited in our prayers, the surahs that are short in length but very weighty in meaning, carrying the core essential message of the Qur'an. It is a rare opportunity to study these surah's with an extraordinary scholar and thinker who is an expert in both tafsir and hadith.

Cambridge Islamic College is a registered educational charity.(Charity Number 1163646) Please support CIC to carry on its mission. Please visit https://www.cambridgeislamiccollege.org/donate to see how you can support.

title: Tafsir of Surah Al-Kahf by Sheikh Mohammad Akram Nadwi
description:
"Whoever preserves the first ten verses of Surah Al-Kahf will be protected from the Dajjal" Prophet Mohammad (SAW)

This surah was revealed in Makkah at a time when the hostility of the Quraysh, and their fear and hatred of Islam and of the Prophet, were at their height. They adopted every measure to stop the Prophet from preaching and the people from listening to him; soon they would plot to kill him: there are hints in the surah that the command to emigrate to Madinah is imminent.

Listen in as Sheikh Akram Nadwi delves into the key concepts and themes present in the stories of Musa (AS) and Khidr, Dhul Qarnain, the Companions of the Cave, the Owner of the Two Gardens, and the Last Day. Each of these stories holds significant lessons and messages that are still applicable to our lives today.

title: Malaikah Refresh
description: Embark on this exciting journey of self-improvement and spiritual growth with Malaikah Refresh. Together, we'll explore ways to refine our character, enhance our connection with Allah (SWT), and become better Muslims in our daily lives. Don't miss out on this valuable discussion—be sure to like, share, and subscribe for more insightful and inspiring episodes! Let's learn and grow together, one step at a time. 🙏💫

title: Le Idee dello Strong Believer
description:
Strong Believer è un progetto di potenziamento personale e di crescita spirituale fondato da Abed Elbakki Rtaib, dedicato a tutti i musulmani che vogliono diventare dei credenti forti, in grado di fare la differenza nella propria comunità.

Il nostro obiettivo è forgiare una generazione di musulmani capaci di contribuire alla rinascita della Umma.

Il profeta Muhammad (s) disse: “Il credente forte è migliore e più amato da Allah rispetto al credente debole…e vi è del bene in entrambi”.

Questo è il detto che ispira il lavoro che sta dietro al progetto STRONG BELIEVER.

Il progetto mira a contribuire alla rinascita della Umma, della comunità musulmana, puntando sulla divulgazione di un pensiero islamico autentico potenziante e attraverso la formazione di credenti forti.

Il ragionamento che vi è dietro è complesso, ma si può sintetizzare così: - credenti deboli compongono una Umma debole. - credenti forti compongono una Umma forte.

I will be sharing detailed stories and advice on some personal parts of my life from high school till now and how I battled my demons and found peace and self-love in my religion and understanding the importance of self-love and hope.

title: The Safi Bros Podcast
description:
The aim of The Safi Bros podcast is to motivate and inspire Muslim youth and young professionals who are seeking inspiration and guidance on their own path to success.

We hope to achieve this by launching Success Stories, a series of insightful interviews with accomplished Muslims from all walks of life. Our audience will be taken on a journey through the experiences of our guests, where they will gain valuable insight into what it takes to achieve success.

“The best of us are the ones who are most beneficial to others”

To follow the path of our beloved Prophet Muhammad (عَلَيْهِ ٱلسَّلَامُ) projecting his beacon of light & hope. projecting his ever- beaming smile that would exude optimism. Relay his words, whether of warning or of good news, to inspire positive action.

title: MM Akbar
description: M. Mohammed Akbar, popularly known as MM Akbar, a renowned orator and comparative religion scholar, has been serving as director of Niche of Truth since 1992. The Cochin-based islamic missionary organization's objective is to present Islam as a comprehensive religion in front of India's pluralist society. Niche of Truth use all modern facilities for Dawa work and these include correspondence courses, websites, dialogues, debates, and periodicals. They try to focus on the culture of dialogue and dispelling hatred of Islam.
